actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to establish a National Water, Air, and Soil Technologies Evaluation Center.

summary.text: Establishes the Department of Energy's test facility at Butte, Montana, as the National Water, Air, Soil Technologies Evaluation Center. Requires the Center to: (1) assist in the analysis of hazardous waste and other contaminants generated by, or situated on the property of, Federal agencies; (2) conduct research, development, and evaluations of waste disposal technologies; (3) certify and provide training in the use of technology in the removal of contaminants from water, air, and soil; and (4) promote the transfer of such technologies between and among Government agencies and private industry. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to establish a National Water, Air, and Soil Technologies Evaluation Center.
